movies.original_title: ปัง
movies.overview: Follows a ruthless hitman who, after narrowly escaping a fatal attempt on his life, betrays his gang in an effort to find forgiveness but ends up becoming a target himself.
movies.tagline: Once a killer, now the mark.
movies.title: Bang

movies.original_title: หมู่บ้านโคกะโหลก
movies.overview: A wave of chilling serial murders emerges, marked by the gruesome decay of male victims' secret part. As the police investigate, they confront eerie local myths and dark secrets.
movies.tagline: The legend awakens. terrifying. ridiculous. unstoppable.
movies.title: Ko Ga Loak Village

movies.original_title: โกยเถอะเกย์
movies.overview: Aud and Yai, a gay couple in a big city, move to a remote town and reopen an old gas station. Yai has an affair with a local woman and Aud plots murder. Neither man knows the gas station is haunted and the spirits have plans of their own.
movies.tagline: The story of a bizarre secret, when love is in the toilet.
movies.title: Ghost Station

movies.original_title: 4 ป่าช้า
movies.overview: Defy death in a graveyard where the djinn awaits, Escape death and flee from ghosts in a cemetery marked by violent deaths, Cheat death and bring your beloved back from the grave, A haunted doll leads the kids to the mysterious dead of the deaf kid in the graveyard.
movies.tagline: 4 graveyard tales unearthing fear from its graves!
movies.title: Graveyard Horror

movies.original_title: เพราะเราคู่กัน THE MOVIE
movies.overview: To avoid unwanted attention, a college student asks the most popular guy on campus to pretend to date him — but their fake feelings become real love.
movies.title: 2gether: The Movie

movies.original_title: มอ 6/5 ปากหมาท้าผี 3
movies.overview: When a group of young children, Secondary 6/5, graduated from high school Therefore reunited with the younger generation to go to Phuket But from a fun trip it turned into a horror.
movies.tagline: Stay teen, stay cool, stay and scream out loudest. Hey, guy! say hi to the dead swarm.
movies.title: Make Me Shudder 3

movies.overview: Plot TBA.

movies.original_title: O.T. ผี Overtime

movies.tagline: Working late tonight? You've got company.
movies.title: O.T. Ghost Overtime

movies.original_title: พี่ชาย My Hero
movies.overview: An 11-year-old boy steals money for bribes to remove his gay older brother from Thai military conscription rolls, unaware of the ramifications.
movies.tagline: Even if someone else has to lose...
movies.title: How to Win at Checkers (Every Time)

movies.original_title: อนงค์ 2..สามสี่ชาติ
movies.overview: Witness the deep bond between Joe and Anong, which has been long-lasting through many lifetimes and reincarnations.
movies.title: My Boo 2

movies.original_title: 11-12-13 รักกันจะตาย
movies.overview: 1 accident, 3 incidents, 3 horrors, 3 days that marked the beginning of love until death do us part. It happened during the 11th, 12th, and 13th April which is during the Songkran festival.
movies.tagline: I'll be back to stay with you.
movies.title: Ghost Is All Around

movies.original_title: องค์บาก 2
movies.overview: Tien, the son of Lord Sihadecho — a murdered nobleman — is taken under the wing of Chernang, a renowned warrior and leader of the Pha Beek Krut.
movies.title: Ong Bak 2

movies.original_title: รักจับใจ The Romantic Musical
movies.overview: A romance musical movie that tells a story of a superstar who falls for a blind girl.  Described by theatre critic Alongkorn Parivudhiphongs as captivating bubblegum entertainment, Ruk Jub Jai: The Romantic Musical was an unanticipated hit, with a total of 49 performances at Muang Thai Rachadalai Theatre.  More than 60,000 theatre-goers went to the successful theatrical production, while the movie version of the play premiered on November 22. It was shown at Major Cineplex cinemas. This was the first time in Thailand that a stage production had been adapted for the silver screen. The film was made by GTH Studio, who used special equipment to capture the live performances on stage. They also filmed some scenes without an audience.  The film version of the romantic comedy allows more close-ups of sentimental scenes between Sukrit Wisetkaew (Bie) and Nuengthida Sophon (Noona) in their respective roles as a singing superstar and a blind girl.
movies.title: Ruk Jub Jai: The Romantic Musical

movies.original_title: ธี่หยด 3
movies.overview: After successfully defeated the black-suited ghost, Yak must now set out on another journey to find Yee, his youngest sister who has been kidnapped by a cult. Yak and his partner Sergeant Paphan are forced to enter a fearsome cursed village.
movies.title: Death Whisperer 3

movies.original_title: พนักงานใหม่ (โปรดรับไว้พิจารณา)
movies.overview: Working in HR at a challenging company, Fren interviews young new hires and is secretly one month pregnant, grappling with the decision to have a child in difficult circumstances.
movies.tagline: We are all new recruits in this world.
movies.title: Human Resource

movies.original_title: Walking
movies.overview: "A morning at home is full of vibrations. The movements of surrounding lives manifest on the wooden floor. Today, the feet are free. They become autonomous and synchronize with the leaves, the wind, and the sun. At one point, they merge. At another point, they disintegrate." (Weerasethakul)
movies.title: Walking

movies.original_title: Day 10
movies.overview: On the 10th day of quarantine, Aey heard a female voice from the balcony of the next room. They started chatting because they were both lonely.
movies.tagline: We are lonely all over the world

movies.original_title: ตีสาม 3D

movies.tagline: Meet the "King of Thieves", whose life is coming to an end.

Even though Praenarin says, "I will never love you. I absolutely will not love you.",

Khem still insists, "I will wait and see. I will wait until the day that Rin loves Khem...with all her heart."

This is the a ground-breaking and uplifting dating reality show made in Thailand, where 12 single men and women live together in Koh Samui, cut off from the outside world, pursuing boundless love. Through competitive games, they win dates and survival supplies. In the end, they'll make the final choice about who they want to keep seeing after the show.

"X" stands for the unknown, crossing paths and infinite possibilities—find the "X" of your dreams together!

tv_shows.name: I Can See Your Voice Thailand
tv_shows.original_name: นักร้องซ่อนแอบ
tv_shows.overview: Thailand version of the reality singing competition where g celebrities must correctly guess a real singer, based on appearance and a few hints only.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Presented with a group of seven "mystery singers" identified only by their occupation, a guest artist must attempt to eliminate bad singers from the group without ever hearing them sing, assisted by clues and a celebrity panel over the course of four rounds. At the end of the game, the last remaining mystery singer is revealed as either good or bad by means of a duet between them and one of the guest artists.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview:
The fourth season of the mystery music game show I Can See Your Voice Thailand will air November 4, 2020, on Workpoint TV. I Can See Your Voice Thailand is the Thai adaption of the South Korean program of the same name. The show is hosted by Kan Kantathavorn and Somkiat Chanphram.

However, due to the COVID-19 pandemic in Thailand, episodes will continue filming but with no audience admitted with enhanced COVID-19 safety protocols being in effect.

seasons.name: Festival
seasons.overview: For this season, under the original format, the guest artist can eliminate one or two mystery singers after each round. The game concludes with the last mystery singer standing that depends on outcome of a duet performance with a guest artist.

seasons.name: TPOP
seasons.overview: T-pop artists are presented with six singers whose singing abilities are a mystery. Through a series of four rounds, the guest artist is given new information that may or may not help them eliminate potential bad singers. In the end, the artist will learn if their final pick is in fact a good singer when they perform a duet with them.

seasons.name: Pitbabe II
seasons.overview: One year after Tony’s death, a hidden world of powers emerges. As Charlie fights to expose those exploiting them, his bond with Babe is tested when they uncover a deadly conspiracy led by Tony, who isn’t as dead as they believed.

tv_shows.name: Iron Chef Thailand
tv_shows.original_name: เชฟกระทะเหล็ก ประเทศไทย
tv_shows.overview: เชฟกระทะเหล็ก ประเทศไทย เป็นเกมโชว์การทำอาหาร ออกอากาศทุกวันพุธ เวลา 23.00 น. - 01.00 น. โดยเริ่มอากาศครั้งแรกเมื่อวันพุธที่ 25 มกราคม พ.ศ. 2555 ทางสถานีโทรทัศน์สีกองทัพบกช่อง 7 ตามรูปแบบของรายการ ยุทธการกระทะเหล็ก ที่ออกอากาศครั้งแรกวันที่ 10 ตุลาคม พ.ศ. 2536 โดยได้รับลิขสิทธิ์จากบริษัท ฟูจิ ครีเอทีฟ คอร์ปอเรชั่น จำกัด ประเทศญี่ปุ่น โดยได้รับลิขสิทธิ์ในการผลิตรายการนี้ ในอีกหลายภาษา
